H0.text: Neil Kinnock's son Stephen is married to the Prime Minister of which Country. Norway

H1.text: Neil Kinnock's son Stephen is married to the Prime Minister of which Country. Sweden

H2.text: Neil Kinnock's son Stephen is married to the Prime Minister of which Country. Finland

H3.text: Neil Kinnock's son Stephen is married to the Prime Minister of which Country. Danska

A4.text: He also was Spouse of the Prime Minister of Denmark from 2011 to 2015.

A5.text: In 1996, Kinnock married Helle Thorning-Schmidt, who later became Prime Minister of Denmark.
